titles.title: Encouraging and promoting greater involvement of fathers in their children's lives and expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding a National Responsible Father's Day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: 6/14/2000--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House that a National Responsible Father's Day should be established to encourage fathers around the country to reconnect and rededicate themselves to their children's lives, to spend time with them, and to express their love and support for their children.
